Joliot-Curie 15, room 304 50-383 Wrocław Phone: +48 71 375 78 21 Email: kiero [at] cs [dot] uni [dot] wroc [dot] pl Office hours: contact via email About me PhD in 2003, Habilitation in 2013. Associate professor at Institute of Computer Science, University of Wrocław. Research interests Logic in computer science. In particular: decidability and complexity of fragments of first-order logic (two-variable logics, guarded fragments, modal and description logics, etc.) Research projects Polish National Science Centre grant 2016/21/B/ST6/01444: A quest for new computer logics. 2017-2021 Polish National Science Centre grant 2021/41/B/ST6/00996: From expressive description logics to multi-variable fragments of first-order logic: Reasoning in finite structures. 2022-2025 PC membership ICALP 2017, AAAI 2020, ECAI 2020, AAAI 2021, ICALP 2021, AAAI 2022, CSL 2022, KR 2022, AAAI 2023, AAAI 2024 List of publications (See also: [DBLP] [Google Scholar].) 2025 Two-Variable Logic for Hierarchically Partitioned and Ordered Data.
